-Detailed discussion of this measurement is in
NIM,122,343,197407. The vanadium x-section has been
often used as a reference standard but discrepancies
exist with the BNL-325 recommended value.

Permanent filter of 8 mm vanadium in the beam was used
-99.7 % purity. Sheets 1 mm thick, 28 mm diameter
combined to give total thicknesses of 5-10 mm. Sample
H 5 ppm by weight. W 31+-2 ppm by weight.
